sentences.sContent: The person that decorticate says: 4 city gate, can attack only, attack which?

sentences.sCn: 剥皮者说：四个城门，只能攻一个，攻哪个？

sentences.sContent: The person that decorticate says: No matter play what game, put in a word 's charge finally: The person just is kingcraft more.

sentences.sCn: 剥皮者说：不管玩什么游戏，最后都归成一句话：人多才是王道。

sentences.sContent: The person that decorticate says: This really truly, if you at ordinary times recreational time is more, so play " Chi Zha the Three Kingdoms " can bring extra income to you.

words.tran: 剥外皮；[外科] 去皮质术
